condition: doc.razorpayx_payout_status == "Cancelled" or doc.razorpayx_payout_status == "Rejected" or doc.razorpayx_payout_status == "Failed" or doc.razorpayx_payout_status == "Reversed"
message:
Payout has been {{ doc.razorpayx_payout_status }}

Payment Entry: {{ doc.name }}
Rematks:

{{ doc.remarks }}
name: Failed Payout
subject: Payout has been {{ doc.razorpayx_payout_status }} for Payment Entry {{ doc.name }}
